Honolulu.Broken Ridge Buddhist Temple: Broken Ridge Buddhist Temple (Hangul: 무량사 "Mu Ryang Sa") is a Korean Buddhist temple on the island of Oahu in the U.S. state of Hawaii. Originally known as the "Dae Won Sa Temple," it was constructed on King St in Honolulu in 1975. After being destroyed by fire, construction of the new temple located in the Palolo Valley began in 1986.
